noPermission.description_embed: You do not have permission to use this command!

disabledFeatures.description_embed: You have successfully disabled the **{0}** feature.
disabledFeatures.feature_disabled_by_alka: The function is currently disabled and cannot be enabled/disabled.
disabledFeatures.feature_premium: This feature is premium. Get the Pro version for **€1.99**/month or purchase your own White Label bot and make Alka Hub yours for just **€3.99**/month. See terms and conditions at [alkanetwork.eu](https://alkanetwork.eu/)

enabledFeatures.description_embed: You have successfully enabled the **{0}** feature.

initCommand.error_timezone: The time zone entered is not recognised, use for example "GB" for the English time zone, if you think this is an error contact support in the official discord at https://docs.alkanetwork.eu/
initCommand.description_embed: You have successfully initialized {0}. Now you can fully enjoy all the features of {0}!

helpCommand.noModuleSelectEmbed:
{0} is here to make your life easier! Use the /help command followed by a specific module to get details about each feature.

:bulb: Example: /help [module_name]

:pushpin: Explore the available modules to discover everything you can do with {0}.
helpCommand.description_embed:
Here’s an explanation of the requested module!

[!] HASHES are variables that can be used in the **Admin Ranks** module.
helpCommand.general_commands:
- **/help** *[NO HASH]* - The command displays the complete list of available commands.
- **/init** *[NO HASH]* - The command initializes the server settings and language from the available options.
- **/features** *[features]* - The command enables or disables the features available in {0}.
helpCommand.logs_commands: - **/logschannel** *[logschannel]* - The command sets up the various log channels for sending Logs System events.
helpCommand.permissions_commands:
- **/permission** *[NO HASH]* - The command assigns permissions to roles for features and commands. These permissions are set using HASHES.
- **/permissionlist** *[permissionlist]* - The command displays the various permissions set for each role.
helpCommand.ticket_commands:
- **/ticket** *[ticket]* - The command starts the configuration for the ticket system via a specially created channel, follow the instructions.
- **/ticketcomponents** *[ticket]* - The command sets the components (buttons) in the ticket message configured via /ticket.
helpCommand.autovoice_commands: - **/autovoice** *[autovoice]* - The command starts the configuration for the auto voice system via a specially created channel, follow the instructions.
helpCommand.autorole_commands:
- **/autorole** *[autorole]* - The command adds or removes the selected role from the list of auto roles to be set.
- **/autorolelist** *[autorole]* - The command shows the list of currently set auto roles in the server.
helpCommand.reactionrole_commands:
- **/reactionrole** *[reactionrole]* - The command sets the roles to be assigned through reaction roles via messages.
- **/reactionrolelist** *[reactionrole]* - The command shows the list of reaction roles currently set in the server.
- **/reactionroleremove** *[reactionrole]* - The command removes the reaction roles set via messages.
helpCommand.statistics_commands:
- **/statistics** *[statsServer]* - The command allows the creation of a category for the statistics system.
- **/channelstats** *[statsServer]* - The command enables the creation of channels for the statistics system.
- **/markdownstats** *[statsServer]* - The command displays a brief documentation of the markdowns available for different types of channels.
- **/channelstatsedit** *[statsServer]* - The command allows you to update channel names to add emojis and markdowns.
helpCommand.twitch_commands:
- **/twitchnotify** *[twitchNotify]* - The command adds or removes a channel for notifications when a streamer goes live.
- **/twitchlist** *[twitchNotify]* - The command displays the list of channels set up to receive streamer notifications.
helpCommand.youtube_commands:
- **/youtubenotify** *[youtubeNotify]* - The command adds or removes a channel for notifications when a video is published or goes live.
- **/youtubelist** *[youtubeNotify]* - The command displays the list of channels set up to receive YouTube notifications.
helpCommand.musicbot_commands:
- **/play** *[NO HASH]* - The command adds a song/playlist to the queue and plays it in the voice channel.
- **/next** *[musicNextSkip]* - The command initiates a vote to skip to the next song in the queue.
- **/stop** *[musicStopSkip]* - The command initiates a vote to stop the queue and disconnect the Music Bot.
helpCommand.giveaway_commands:
- **/giveaway** *[giveaway]* - The command starts a giveaway in the channel where the command is typed.
- **/giveawayparticipants** *[giveaway]* - The command shows the current list of participants in the giveaway using its ID.
- **/giveawayend** *[giveaway]* - The command immediately ends the giveaway without waiting for the expiration date, selecting a winner.
helpCommand.welcome_commands: - **/welcome** *[welcome]* - The command configures the Welcome Message.

whoisCommand.unverified_storyline: Storyline Not Verified by other servers
